title: Welcome to Nightshade Salon
text:
Step into a world where elegance meets mystery. At Nightshade Salon, we transform everyday routines into luxurious experiences. Immerse yourself in our curated services, designed to highlight your unique style, guided by our talented team of stylists who blend artistry with precision.
Discover our signature treatments, explore the portfolio of our master stylists, and let your inner confidence shine. Whether you’re here for a bold new look or a refined touch, Nightshade Salon is where style becomes an unforgettable statement.
Experience luxury. Embrace your edge. Welcome to Nightshade.


Explore Services   Meet Our Stylists   View Gallery   Contact Us

title: Contact Us
text:
We’d love to hear from you! Whether you want to book an appointment, ask a question, or just say hello, reach out to us using the information below.


Email: nightshadesalon@gmail.com

Phone: 250-802-7998




 


Send Message

title: Meet Our Stylists
text:
Our team of expert stylists blends creativity, precision, and passion to give you a look that’s uniquely yours.





Merlyn White

Master Stylist & Owner

With over 10 years of experience, Merlyn White is a master of color and precision. She specializes in alternative and edgy cuts, bringing creativity and bold style to every client. Passionate about vivid colors and personal connections, Merlyn takes the time to understand your vision. Each appointment begins with a thorough consultation to ensure your look is tailored perfectly to your style and needs.

title: Our Services
text:
Whether you want a fresh haircut, vibrant color, or rejuvenating treatment, Nightshade Salon delivers unforgettable results.




Short Haircut: $50

Medium Haircut: $70

Long Haircut: $90
Prices may vary depending on hair length and complexity.

Shampoo & Style: $50+

Book Now





Root Touch-Up: $85+

All-Over Color: $130+

Partial Foil: $100+ (toner included)

Full Highlight: $180+ (toner included)

Bleach Out: $200+

Balayage: $250+ (toner included)

Book Now





Toner: $50

Conditioning Treatment: $40

Indian Head Massage (30 min): $75

Indian Head Massage (60 min): $100+

Consultation: Personalized in-depth consultation with your stylist

Book Now
